name: Sort IT!
description:
Even as people grow older, they can still get confused with what exactly is the difference between vegetables and fruits or what is categorized as glass and what is metal. 

This is a LOW-FIDELITY 2D educational puzzle game in which the player acts as a child whose goal is to sort items to their proper boxes. During the game, the player must find different ways the items can be pushed without getting stuck and learn the categorizations of the items to pass the levels.

CREDITS:

Jiaxin Huang - Programmer / Environmental Artist

Peyton Rodgers - Prop Artist /  Animator

Omar Ali - Sound / Level Designer
